backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping website requirements to frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of main frontend files including App.tsx, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app into a root div and imports main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React single-page layout with sticky navigation, hero header, service sections, contact section, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context provider and hook handling login, logout, identity loading, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining warm industrial color palette and dark mode tokens with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that mounts React, initializes react-query, wraps with InternetIdentityProvider, and loads styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings (colors, fonts, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including versioning, required images, and a list of implemented features for the Beniwal Music Center website.
